Events.PreEventString: You find a $1 on the sea floor. Probably been there for ages.
Events.PostEventString: You pick it up and continue on your way.

Events.PreEventString: In the darkness, you see only shining eyes from a Pokemon. It's a $1, hunting for it's prey.
Events.PostEventString: The Pokemon swims away, leaving its $1 behind.

Events.PreEventString: You see an extremely large $1, which has been gathering power from a nearby thermal vent. It doesn't seem to be able to control it's power and immediately attacks you.
Events.PostEventString: After defeat, the Pokemon shrinks back to normal size. It was holding a $1.

Events.PreEventString: You see a shining purple crystal, one of the few sources of light deep below. It talks to you: YE WHO SEEK AWAKENING, LET US BEGIN.
A nearby set of hydrothermal vents give you and your pokemon a warm place to recover.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered some health.

Events.PreEventString: A rare sight! A Milotic is swimming around. It is struck with sadness, seeing your injured Pokemon.
Events.PostEventString: It uses a huge Life Dew on $1, fully healing it.

Events.PreEventString: A nearby set of hydrothermal vents give you and your pokemon a warm place to recover.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered from harmful conditions.

Events.PreEventString: A nearby set of hydrothermal vents give you and your pokemon a warm place to recover.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon moves recover some PP.

Events.PreEventString: A small school of Pokemon are swimming by. They don't see you in time, and crash against your party.
Events.PostEventString: The school is defeated and the Pokemon swim away, scared.

Events.PreEventString: A nearby set of hydrothermal vents give you and your pokemon a warm place to recover.
Events.PostEventString: You approach it, but the water was scalding hot, your Pokemon sustain some damage.

Events.PreEventString: A nearby set of hydrothermal vents give you and your pokemon a warm place to recover.
Events.PostEventString: You approach it, but the water was scalding hot. $1 is now burned.

Events.PreEventString: You find a set of undersea ruins, belonging to a very old civilization now lost.
Events.PostEventString: In one of the walls, you see a $1. You pick it up.

Events.PreEventString: You find a set of undersea ruins. These ones have weird glyphs on the wall. Suddenly, they start shining and moving!
Events.PostEventString: What secrets do these symbols contain?

Floors.ShortcutClue: You see the entrance to an underwater tunnel. It's pitch dark. Will need a source of light to pass through.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 lights up the tunnel, allowing you to take the shortcut down below.

Floors.ShortcutClue: The Primarina an Brionne in this area are expert in navigating deep sea currents, but they're ignoring you. Perhaps you can get their attention with a song.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 is heard, and the Primarina sing along. They help you navigate the sea currents deep below.

Floors.ShortcutClue: This is the ocean floor. No more shortcuts ahead.

BossEvent.PreEventString: In the deep cold of the ocean floor, there's still a warm and bright oasis full of life. In the center of it all, it's guardian, $1.
BossEvent.PostEventString: The guardian backs away, lets you stay in here for a while. You find $1 in the floor, the Pokemon didn't mind that you took it.

CampingEvent.PreEventString: The cold, darkness and pressure are unbearable. However you find an air pocket and thermal vents which keep you warm. It's the only chance you have for a picnic.
CampingEvent.PostEventString: But for now it's time to move on...
